item.title: CVE-2024-22161|2024-01-31T18:04:57.892Z -- Harmonic Design -- HD Quiz
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Harmonic Design HD Quiz allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HD Quiz: from n/a through 1.8.11.
